tetra.improvement.vvaddon/bloodfull.name: 饱和
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/bloodlow.name: 破釜沉舟
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/height.name: 高地
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/charge.name: 充能
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/combo.name: 连击
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/sniper.name: 远射
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/homology.name: 同调
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/honor.name: 荣耀
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/evil.name: 邪念
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/hitaway.name: 冲击
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/exp_i.name: 经验收割I
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/exp_ii.name: 经验收割II
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/exp_iii.name: 经验收割III
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/rush.name: 居合连斩
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/bloodfull.desc: 血量高于阈值时获得攻击力加成
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/bloodlow.descr: 血量低于阈值时获得攻击力加成
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/height.descrip: 攻击低处的实体获得攻击力加成, 攻击高处的实体受到攻击力衰减
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/charge.descrip: 消耗特定物品, 增强一次攻击
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/combo.descript: 成功连击时获得攻击力加成
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/sniper.descrip: 攻击远处的实体获得攻击力加成, 攻击近处的实体受到攻击力衰减
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/homology.descr: 当背包中有特定物品时, 手持物品会缓慢修复耐久
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/honor.descript: 右键消耗一定耐久获得村庄英雄效果
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/evil.descripti: 右键消耗一定耐久获得不祥之兆效果
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/hitaway.descri: 攻击时击飞受击实体附近的敌人
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/exp_i.descript: 杀死怪物时额外获得少许经验
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/exp_ii.descrip: 杀死怪物时额外获得一些经验
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/exp_iii.descri: 杀死怪物时额外获得较多经验
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/phantom_persui: 使命中的生物在接下来的一段时间内受到幻影箭追加攻击
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/phantom_rain.d: 在命中的生物周围生成幻影箭雨
tetra.improvement.vvaddon/rush.descripti: 向前突进并伤害沿途的生物
